bug.text: In some circumstances, shutdown could hang if servant locators were in use.
The omniORB logger's flush function did not use the application supplied log function.

bug.summary: Object ids not unique in PERSISTENT SYSTEM_ID POAs
bug.text: A POA with the PERSISTENT and SYSTEM_ID policies should generate object ids that are unique across all runs. omniORB failed to do that. See the new poaUniquePersistentSystemIds configuration parameter if you need the old behaviour.

bug.summary: Deadlock race condition in create_POA / destroy
bug.text: If a thread destroying a POA raced with another thread trying to create the same POA, a deadlock could occur.
The .mak files for use with Windows nmake were broken. The Windows binary distribution has been patched.
